# Build Folders
bin/
obj/
Debug/
Release/

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Mono auto generated files
mono_crash.*

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp
*.tlog
*.log

# Visual Studio 2019/2022
.vs/
.vscode/
.vscode-test/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# .NET Core
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
.nuget/
packages/
*.dll

# Azure Functions
local.settings.json

# Mac Files
.DS_Store

# Rider
.idea/
.idea_modules/

# JetBrains Rider & IntelliJ
.idea/
.idea_modules/

# Local History for IntelliJ
.idea_modules/localhistory/

# Rider settings
.idea/workspace.xml
.idea/tasks.xml
.idea/usage.statistics.xml

# Rider file-based indices
.idea_index/

# Rider caches
.idea/caches/

# Rider logs
.idea/logs/
